IMPORTANT INFORMATION ABOUT YOUR USE OF THE ONLINE SERVICES
Welcome to the bookofrelations.com website (“Online Services”) which is owned and operated by Lucas & Cribb Digital Developers, LLC (LCDD), an internet publisher of personal histories (“LCDD”) for the purpose of facilitating access to information about LCDD and its products and services.

WEBSITE CONTENT
The content on the website should not be considered as either true or false, but merely reminiscences of individuals that may or may not be factually accurate. None of the content on this website represents or warrants that any particular posting is accurate. Without limitation, LCDD does not recommend or endorse any posting

EXCHANGE OF INFORMATION
You understand that the information you provide to LCDD through the Online Services is not protected by any copyright laws, however, LCDD will handle your information in accordance with its Privacy Policy. All information you provide to LCDD on this website will remain a part of LCDD’s records.

By agreeing to these Terms of Use you certify that you understand that LCDD may use or disclose the information you supply: (i) as set forth in its Privacy Policy, (ii) to provide you with information relating to its products and services, as well as information from third parties that LCDD concludes you may be interested in, and (iii) to Providers with whom you are associated.

ACCOUNT ENROLLMENT AND YOUR REQUIREMENTS
To access the Online Services, you must first enroll to establish an individual user account (“Account”), by providing certain information. In exchange for your use of the website and the Online Services you agree to: (i) provide true, accurate, current and complete information about yourself as prompted by our account enrollment form; and (ii) each time you log on, maintain and promptly update such account information to keep it true, accurate, current and complete. If you provide any information that is untrue, inaccurate, not current or incomplete, or we have reasonable grounds to suspect that such account information is untrue, inaccurate, not current or incomplete, we reserve the right to suspend or terminate your Account and refuse any and all current or future use of the website or the Online Services or any portion thereof.

ACCOUNT SECURITY
Upon enrollment, you will establish a unique username and password (which may be changed from time to time). Your Account, username, and password are personal to you and you are responsible for maintaining the security of passwords associated with the Account you use to access the Online Services. You should never allow anyone to access your Account on your behalf. You assume responsibility for all unauthorized use of your Account username, or password, and you must promptly notify LCDD of all actual or suspected unauthorized use. To permit you to access the Online Services on behalf of a minor child of whom you are a parent or legal guardian, you may establish one or more subaccounts in connection with your Account. Any such LCDD-authorized subaccount(s) shall be deemed an Account for purposes of these Terms of Use.

  • You will not incorporate any code into the code of the Online Services or use the Online Services to post or transmit any computer code that is harmful, or may be or is intended to, damage or to monitor the use or operation of the Online Services or any other user of the Online Services.
  • You will not use the Online Services to harvest or collect personally identifiable information about users of the Online Services or any other information concerning the Online Services.

LCDD will not impose any fee to process the withdrawal of your consent to receive Notices in electronic form; however, your access to and use of the website and Online Services may be terminated. Any withdrawal of your consent to receive Notices in electronic form will be effective only after we have a reasonable period of time to process your withdrawal.

In order to access, view, and retain electronic Notices that LCDD makes available to you, you must: (i) have access to an Internet service account, (ii) an e-mail account (and any necessary e-mail software), and (iii) have access to a personal computer, operating system, and telecommunications connections to the Internet capable of receiving, accessing, displaying, and either printing or storing Notices received from LCDD in electronic form via a plain text-formatted e-mail or by access to the website using your Internet browser application (e.g., Internet Explorer, Firefox, Safari).

LCDD will not send you a paper copy of a Notice which is available electronically unless you request it, or we otherwise deem it appropriate to do so. You can obtain a paper copy of an electronic Notice by printing it yourself or by requesting that we mail you a paper copy, provided that such request is made within a reasonable time after we first provided the electronic Notice to you. To request a paper copy, call us at 1-800-328-8602. LCDD may charge you a reasonable service charge, of which we will have provided you prior notice, for the delivery of paper copies of any Notice provided to you electronically pursuant to this authorization. LCDD reserves the right, but assumes no obligation, to provide a paper (instead of electronic) copy of any Notice that you have authorized us to provide electronically.

All Notices in either electronic or paper format from us to you will be considered “in writing.” You should print or download for your records a copy of this Disclosure and any other Notice that is important to you.

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I become a Member so I can add my own stories?
Can anyone add stories?
Do I have to adds stories once I am a member?
Is there a charge for becoming a member?

How do I become a Member so I can add my own stories?
Simply register at http://bookofrelations.com/. Once you verify your registration, log in and begin adding your own stories to the archives by going to Add Your History. Here you can add as many stories as you would like without any limitations to content.

Can anyone add stories?
Yes. All you have to do is registor for FREE with the site and begin adding your own stories.

Do I have to add stories once I am a member?
You do not. It is optional to add stories. You are welcome to join and browse through other stories that have been added to Book of Relations. We do hope that you take advantage of our services by adding your own historical stories so others can enjoy them as you enjoy others.

Is there a charge for becoming a member?
No. This is a free site to join, search and add content. We want you to enjoy the ability to add stories for you family members, friends, and others to enjoy without financial obligation.
Member Information

As a Member of Book of Relations, you will enjoy the freedom to add your family history and stories as often and as much as you like. Tell those stories you heard as a child, or simply begin a biography. The freedom is yours to add this information and have it to share with generations.

REPORT ABUSE

Username
Email
Subject
Content
Welcome to Book of Relations!

Don't let your family history be forgotten...
You fit into a bigger context than you probably think. Our past has created our present. How we are interconnected with our ancestors, al the way down to our parents, is a fascinating area of study. But have you ever wondered how all of our ancestors may have been rlated to each other?

We aren't just talking about blood relations, or relations by marriage, but relationships founded on geography, neighborhoods, businesses, travels and travails shared by people of a community.

As a member, you are able to access all of the data in our archives that directly and indirectly relate to you. With a better understanding of our past, we can have a grasp on who we may become in the future.
This is your opportunity to keep the past alive for generations to come.
